Encryption._comment: Encryption key is loaded from .env file. Set ENCRYPTION_KEY environment variable. Never commit actual keys to version control.

Recaptcha._comment: Keys are loaded from .env file. Set RECAPTCHA_SITE_KEY, RECAPTCHA_SECRET_KEY, and RECAPTCHA_SCORE_THRESHOLD environment variables.

Smtp._comment: SMTP for password reset. Use .env: Smtp__Host, Smtp__Port, Smtp__UserName, Smtp__Password, Smtp__FromEmail, Smtp__EnableSsl
